isosensitivity: 100 - 25600 (ISO can be expanded to L: 50, H1: 51200, H2: 102400)
screenfeatures: - Resolution: 1040,000 dots - 170° wide-angle viewing - Anti-reflection coating - Adjustable brightness - Approx. 100% frame coverage
softwareincluded: - ImageBrowser EX Digital Photo Professional - PhotoStitch - EOS Utility (inc. Remote Capture, WFT utility) - Picture Style Editor
accessoriesincluded: - Battery Pack LP-E6 - Battery charger LC-E6 - Eyecup - Wide strap EW-EOS EOS 5D Mark III - Interface cable IFC-200U - Stereo AV cable AVC-DC400ST
effects: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined
shutterspeed: 30-1/8000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments) + Bulb (Shutter speed range available varies according to shooting mode)
exposuremodes: TTL full aperture metering with 63 zone Dual Layer SPC (1) Evaluative metering (linked to All AF point) (2) Partial metering (approx. 6.2% of viewfinder at centre) (3) Spot metering (approx. 1.5% viewfinder at centre) (4) Centre weighted average metering
whitebalance: Auto white balance with the imaging sensor
